description: An extract from "Carve her name with pride". Tells the story of Violette Szabo, the British secret agent, who undertook various missions in Occupied France during the Second World War, until she was captured and finally shot in Germany. Cast: Violette Szabo - Virginia McKenna Jacques - Maurice Ronet Interrogator - Noel Willman
